sn35.59:1.3: “Cakkhuṁ kho, bhikkhu, anattato jānato passato anusayā samugghātaṁ gacchanti …pe…
sn35.59:1.12: yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi anattato jānato passato anusayā samugghātaṁ gacchanti.
sn35.59:1.13: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṁ passato anusayā samugghātaṁ gacchantī”ti.
